mapper.select: SELECT CONFIRMATION_NO confirmationNo, CONFIRMATION_NAME confirmationName FROM TB_QUALI_CONFIRMATION
SELECT QUALIFICATION_NAME FROM TB_PROFESIONAL_QUALIFICATION ORDER BY QUALIFICATION_NAME
SELECT FIELD_NO fieldNo, FIELD_NAME fieldName FROM TB_QUALI_TECHNICAL_FIELD ORDER BY fieldName
SELECT CATEGORY_NO categoryNo, RELEVANT_DEPARTMENT relevantDepartment FROM TB_QUALI_PROFESIONAL_DEPT ORDER BY relevantDepartment
